project_abstract.cdata: The development objective of the Government's Central Public Administration Reform Project for Moldova is to strengthen institutional capacity of the public administration for better policymaking, policy implementation, and efficient use of public resources. This restructuring will extend the closing date of the project from December 31, 2013 till February 28, 2014. The extension is required to complete implementation of the contract for delivery of information technology (IT) equipment for operation of civil service register at the local level. Implementation of the civil service register is close to completion and is expected to contribute to institutionalization of civil service management, which is one of the project development objective (PDO) indicators under the project results framework. The register is expected to become operational in January 2014. The equipment in question is essential for rolling out the civil service register system to government agencies and for assuring sustainability of the register.
